name: BESUCCESS, INC.
description: Operator of a global media platform intended to offer business ideas and trends from all over the world. The company's platform offers applications that provide information about annual startup conferences as well as educational information to students or upcoming entrepreneurs, enabling users to begin their businesses with knowledge about the world and grow profitably.
